channel.title: Need help connecting to my vps
channel.description: Alright, i have my vps and everything and iv'e opened the ssh terminal and iv'e logged onto root and everything, and iv'e portforwarded but, i just want my server to connect to the vps itself...how would i do that? help would be greatly appreciated at this time...i know that everything other than the vps has worked because iv'e hosted the server itself on my laptop because i plugged into my modem but, i just want it to connect to my vps for 24/7...thanks -Sheathedude

item.title: Need help connecting to my vps
item.dc:creator: @SheaTheDude SheaTheDude
item.description:
@SheaTheDude wrote:

Alright, i have my vps and everything and iv’e opened the ssh terminal and iv’e logged onto root and everything, and iv’e portforwarded but, i just want my server to connect to the vps itself…how would i do that? help would be greatly appreciated at this time…i know that everything other than the vps has worked because iv’e hosted the server itself on my laptop because i plugged into my modem but, i just want it to connect to my vps for 24/7…thanks -Sheathedude
